channel.title: HELP ME With this item bug!
channel.description: Help when i do ::item 1111 it works but when i use a 3 letter item code it doesnt(::item 343) i can add a 0 in front and it works someone please help me and is there a way to fix it!!! Also when you do ::item1111 all together in one sentence it does the same thing stuffs up and logs me out!!

item.title: HELP ME With this item bug!
item.dc:creator: @w00tz0r_pwnz w00tz0r pwnz
item.description:
@w00tz0r_pwnz wrote:

[quote=“mjstar, post:8, topic:117850”]no anyone can do it because it is built in with moparscape same as the commands coordon coordoff and all those ones!!![/quote] make a normal account an try using pickup it doesnt work unless your admin or higher. You can only do that without being an admin on hybridscape which is the default ip adress.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP ME With this item bug!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

Because i wanted admins to be able to do it but not players and everyone can do ::pickup but only admins can do ::item thats why!![br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 07:36:44 PM[/size][hr]Ok well i have figured it out for everyone that didnt know how to do it here is the code[code] else if(command.startsWith(“item”) && playerRights >= 2){
{
int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
addItem(newitem, 1);
}

       		}[/code]

Before i had the (5)) with (5, 9) or something like that so that would mean it would have to be four numbers!! that also gets rid of the glitch!! Ok well you can lock or remove this topic if you want!!!

Read full topic
item.source: HELP ME With this item bug!

why would you make ::pickup ban but not ::item aren’t they the same thing???

item.title: HELP ME With this item bug!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

ok 1 i dont need help coding my server its just these two bugs and two i dont want to use pickup because i made that if you use that it bans you!!! So i dont want to use that and this command is admin!! So please can anyone fix this bug ill post my code on here!! [code] else if(command.startsWith(“item”) && playerRights >= 2){
{
int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 9));
addItem(newitem, 1);
}

       		}[/code] And just reading that would it be the part were i wrote 5,9 (5 to 9) and how would i change that would i write 5 or wat??

Read full topic
